  • Element
fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.activation

Annotation Type ActivationServices


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=PACKAGE)
public @interface ActivationServices
    Declares dependencies required when activating a bundle, and declares provided services and other resources.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies
    See Also:
    IServiceActivator

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      Class<? extends IServiceActivator> serviceActivator
      Defines the service activator class to be instantiated when all mandatory dependencies are resolved.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean bundleActivatorGenerated
      Defines whether compile-time annotation processing should generate an annotation-based OSGi bundle activator.
      Configuration[] configuration
      Defines mandatory configuration dependencies that must be resolved before instantiating the service activator.
      Dictionary[] dictionary
      Declares localization dictionaries defined in this bundle that are to be registered when the bundle is active.
      ProvideService[] provide
      Declares services that may be registered when the service activator is instantiated.
      RequireService[] require
      Defines mandatory service dependencies that must be resolved before instantiating the service activator.

    • Element Detail

      • serviceActivator

        public abstract Class<? extends IServiceActivator> serviceActivator
        Defines the service activator class to be instantiated when all mandatory dependencies are resolved. The service activator class must be defined in this annotated package, and not in any other package (including subpackages).
        Returns:
        the name of the class, which must define an accessible constructor accepting an instance of IServiceActivator as its only parameter.
        Since:
        1.0

      • bundleActivatorGenerated

        public abstract boolean bundleActivatorGenerated
        Defines whether compile-time annotation processing should generate an annotation-based OSGi bundle activator. The generation is handled by codegen.jar (provided as part of the ViewShell SDK) when specified using the -processorpath argument for the javac Java compiler command.
        Returns:
        true (the default) if an annotation-based OSGi BundleActivator should be generated, otherwise false.
        Since:
        1.0
        Default:
        true

      • configuration

        public abstract Configuration[] configuration
        Defines mandatory configuration dependencies that must be resolved before instantiating the service activator. Declaring such dependencies will implicitly define a mandatory dependency upon IConfigService.
        Returns:
        0..n configuration dependency descriptors, each with unique auxiliary IDs in the context of the annotated package. To declare a default (non-auxiliary) configuration dependency, omit the auxiliary ID (only one such dependency may be declared per package).
        Since:
        1.0
        Default:
        {}

      • require

        public abstract RequireService[] require
        Defines mandatory service dependencies that must be resolved before instantiating the service activator.
        Returns:
        0..n service dependency descriptors.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        SystemService, PluginService, IServiceContext.getService(IService), IServiceContext.getRankedServices(IService)
        Default:
        {}

      • provide

        public abstract ProvideService[] provide
        Declares services that may be registered when the service activator is instantiated.
        Returns:
        0..n possible service registration declarations, each with a unique service registration interface type.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        PluginService, IServiceContext.register(IService, Object)
        Default:
        {}

      • dictionary

        public abstract Dictionary[] dictionary
        Declares localization dictionaries defined in this bundle that are to be registered when the bundle is active. Declaring such dependencies will implicitly define a mandatory dependency upon ILocaleService.
        Returns:
        0..n possible dictionary declarations, each with a unique name.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        ILocaleService.getDictionary(String, fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.locale.DictionaryType, fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.locale.FormatType)
        Default:
        {}
